attributes.action: cause the petition office staff at No 10 properly to read petitions to ensure that rejections are valid and not merely a jerk reaction to take the requested petition off the list in the hope that we, the taxpayers of this land, are going to go away.  We are not!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
